39 from __future__ import print_function
40 
41 import sys
42 from time import sleep
43 import rospy
44 from std_msgs.msg import String
45 
46 sleep(8)
47 print("\n\n\n***composiv_listener unit test started!***\n\n")
48 
49 #when a message is detected, read it and stop listening to the "chatter" topic.
50 def callback(data):
51  print(rospy.get_caller_id(), "I heard %s"%data.data)
52  print("composiv_listener unit test resulted with success.\n\n")
53  rospy.signal_shutdown("Received %s, exiting now" % data.data)
54 def listener():
55 
56  # in ROS, nodes are unique named. If two nodes with the same
57  # node are launched, the previous one is kicked off. The
58  # anonymous=True flag means that rospy will choose a unique
59  # name for our 'talker' node so that multiple talkers can
60  # run simultaenously.
61  rospy.init_node('listener', anonymous=True)
62 
63  rospy.Subscriber("chatter", String, callback)
64 
65  # spin() simply keeps python from exiting until this node is stopped
66  rospy.spin()
67 
68 if __name__ == '__main__':
69  listener()
